label: uncl2013
comment: Code specifying the rate of recurrence.

values.label: Continuous
values.comment: Flexible frequency scheduling based on continuous consumption of items.

values.label: Synchronous
values.comment: Flexible frequency scheduling based on synchronous consumption of items.

values.label: Discrete
values.comment: Flexible frequency according to planning process.

values.label: Replenishment
values.comment: Flexible frequency scheduling based on replenishment of the consumption of items.

values.label: Flexible interval (from date X through date Y)
values.comment: Code defining a forecasted usage that is planned between two defined dates.

values.label: Just-in-time
values.comment: Scheduling based on just-in-time of the need.

values.label: Monthly (calendar months)
values.comment: Code defining a forecast by calendar month(s).

values.label: Quarterly (calendar quarters)
values.comment: Code defining a forecast by calendar quarter(s). (Jan- Mar, Apr-Jun, Jul-Sep, Oct-Dec).

values.label: Semi-annually (calendar year)
values.comment: Code defining a forecast for the first six months of the year or the second six months of the year.

values.label: Four week period (13 periods per year)
values.comment: Code defining a forecast for four week intervals.

values.label: Weekly
values.comment: Code defining a forecast for weekly intervals.

values.label: Daily
values.comment: Code defining a schedule by day.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: Code reserved for special trading partner requirements when pre-defined codes do not exist.
